html1.title: Hyper Text Markup Language For Beginners
html1.subtitle: 1. Master the Fundamentals of HTML
html1.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML starting from understanding basic page structure and essential tags, to organizing content in a clear and meaningful way. This module helps you build well structured web pages and understand HTML as the foundation of modern web development.

modules.title: Module 1 : Introduction to HTML
modules.description: A basic introduction to what HTML how it works and the role of structure in building web pages.

modules.title: Module 2: Basic HTML Elements
modules.description: Learn essential elements such as headings, paragraphs, links, images and lists  and how to arrange them properly.

modules.title: Module 3: Structuring a Web Page
modules.description: Understand how to organize a page using structural elements like header, section, body and footer .

modules.title: Module 4: Mini Project(Build a Simple HTML Page)
modules.description: Create a complete web page using all the elements learned throughout the modules.

html2.title: Hyper Text Markup Language For Beginners
html2.subtitle: 2.HTML for UI Design
html2.description: Understand how HTML forms the backbone of interface structure and how it is used to organize visual elements in UI design. This module focuses on how HTML is used to organize visual elements such as sections, text, images, and components, helping designers and developers create clean, consistent and user-friendly interfaces.

modules.title: Module 1 : Introduction to HTML & UI Structure
modules.description: Learn the basics of HTML and how it is used to build the structure of user interfaces.

modules.title: Module 2: UI Styling with CSS
modules.description: Understand how CSS is used to style and enhance the visual appearance of UI components

modules.title: Module 3: UI Layout & Responsive
modules.description: Learn how to create structured layouts and responsive user interfaces for different screen sizes.

modules.title: Module 4: Simple UI Project Development
modules.description: Apply HTML and CSS knowledge to build a simple and complete user interface project.

css1.title: Cascading Style Sheets For Beginners
css1.subtitle: 1. CSS Basics for Beginners
css1.description: Learn the basics of CSS including selectors, properties and how to apply styles to HTML elements. You will also understand how CSS interacts with HTML to create visually appealing web pages.

modules.title: Module 1 : Introduction to CSS
modules.description: This module introduces Cascading Style Sheets and its role in web development. Learners will understand how CSS is used to style HTML elements, control layout, colors, fonts and improve the visual appearance of websites.

modules.title: Module 2: CSS Syntax & Selectors
modules.description: This module explains the basic structure of CSS and learners will practice using element selectors, class selectors and ID selectors to apply styles to HTML content.

modules.title: Module 3: Colors, Fonts & Text Styling
modules.description: Learners will learn how to change text color, background color, font family, font size, alignment and spacing to make web pages more attractive.

modules.title: Module 4: CSS Box Model & Layout Basics
modules.description: This module introduces the CSS Box Model including margin, border, padding and content. Learners will also understand basic layout concepts used to structure web pages properly.

css2.title: Cascading Style Sheets For Beginners
css2.subtitle: 2. Layout and Positioning
css2.description: Learn the basics of CSS including selectors, properties and how to apply styles to HTML elements.By the end, you will be able to design complex page structures that adapt to different screen sizes.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to CSS Layout
modules.description: This module introduces the concept of layout in CSS. Learners will understand how web pages are structured and how CSS controls the positioning and arrangement of elements on a webpage.

modules.title: Module 2: CSS Positioning
modules.description: This module focuses on CSS positioning methods such as static, relative, absolute, fixed, and sticky. Learners will understand how elements move and behave on a page using different position values.

modules.title: Module 3: CSS Flexbox Layout
modules.description: This module introduces Flexbox, a one-dimensional layout system in CSS. Learners will learn how to align, space, and arrange elements efficiently in rows or columns.

modules.title: Module 4: CSS Grid Layout
modules.description: This module introduces CSS Grid, a two-dimensional layout system. Learners will learn how to create complex and responsive layouts using rows and columns.

java1.title: JavaScript For Beginners
java1.subtitle: 1. JavaScript Basics
java1.description: Learn variables, functions and control structures in JavaScript.You will also learn how to write simple scripts to make web pages interactive..

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to JavaScript
modules.description: This module introduces JavaScript, the programming language of the web. Learners will understand what JavaScript is how it works with HTML and CSS and how to include scripts in a web page to add interactivity.

modules.title: Module 2: Variables & Data Types
modules.description: Learners will explore variables in JavaScript, including var, let, and const. The module also covers basic data types such as strings, numbers, booleans, arrays and objects and how to store and manipulate data.

modules.title: Module 3: Functions & Scope
modules.description: This module covers functions in JavaScript, including how to declare and call functions, pass arguments, return values and understand variable scope

modules.title: Module 4: Control Structures
modules.description: Learners will understand control flow in JavaScript using conditional statements (if, else if, else), loops (for, while, for...of) and switch statements to execute code based on conditions or repeat tasks.

java2.title: JavaScript For Beginners
java2.subtitle: 2. DOM Manipulation
java2.description: Learn how to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM) using JavaScript. You will learn how to select elements, modify content, handle events, and create dynamic web pages.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to DOM
modules.description: This module introduces the Document Object Model (DOM) and how JavaScript can interact with HTML elements.

modules.title: Module 2: Selecting Elements
modules.description: Learn different methods to select HTML elements using JavaScript.

modules.title: Module 3: Modifying Content
modules.description: Understand how to change text, attributes, and styles of DOM elements.

modules.title: Module 4: Event Handling
modules.description: Learn how to handle user interactions and events in JavaScript.

php1.title: PHP For Beginners
php1.subtitle: 1.PHP Fundamentals
php1.description: Learn syntax, variables and basic programming concepts in PHP.You will also learn how to write dynamic server side scripts to power web applications.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to PHP
modules.description: This module introduces PHP, a popular server-side scripting language used to create dynamic web pages. Learners will understand PHP syntax, how it integrates with HTML, and basic setup for running PHP scripts on a local server.

modules.title: Module 2: PHP Variables & Data Types
modules.description: Learn how to declare and use variables in PHP. This module covers data types such as strings, integers, floats, booleans, arrays, and how to store and manipulate information in PHP scripts.

modules.title: Module 3:PHP Functions & Operators
modules.description: This module teaches how to create and use functions in PHP, including passing arguments, returning values, and using built-in PHP functions. Learners will also understand common operators for arithmetic, comparison, and logical operations.

modules.title: Module 4: PHP Control Structures
modules.description: Learn how to use control structures in PHP, including conditional statements (if, else, switch) and loops (for, while, foreach). This module helps you write dynamic scripts that can make decisions and repeat actions based on conditions.

php2.title: PHP For Beginners
php2.subtitle: 2. Working with Databases
php2.description: Learn how to connect PHP with databases, perform CRUD operations, and secure your database interactions.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to Databases & MySQL
modules.description: This module introduces databases and MySQL, explaining how to set up and manage databases.

modules.title: Module 2: Connecting PHP with MySQL
modules.description: Learn how to establish connections between PHP and MySQL databases.

modules.title: Module 3: CRUD Operations
modules.description: Understand Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations in databases.

modules.title: Module 4: Prepared Statements & Security
modules.description: Learn about prepared statements and how to secure database interactions.

html3.title: Hyper Text Markup Language For Beginners
html3.subtitle: 3. HTML for Digital Marketing
html3.description: Learn how to use HTML to create landing pages, improve SEO and build structured content for digital marketing campaigns.

modules.title: Module 1: HTML for Landing Pages
modules.description: Create effective landing pages using HTML.

modules.title: Module 2: SEO with HTML
modules.description: Optimize HTML for search engines.

modules.title: Module 3: Marketing Content Structure
modules.description: Structure content for marketing purposes.

modules.title: Module 4: Conversion Optimization
modules.description: Use HTML to improve conversions.

html4.title: Hyper Text Markup Language For Beginners
html4.subtitle: 4. HTML for Documentation & Technical Writing
html4.description: Master the use of HTML to create technical documentation, formatted articles, and structured digital reports.

modules.title: Module 1: Documentation Structure
modules.description: Structure technical documentation with HTML.

modules.title: Module 2: Formatting Articles
modules.description: Format articles professionally.

modules.title: Module 3: Digital Reports
modules.description: Create structured digital reports.

modules.title: Module 4: Accessibility in Documentation
modules.description: Make documentation accessible.

css3.title: Cascading Style Sheets For Beginners
css3.subtitle: 3. Dynamic Web Design with Advanced CSS
css3.description: Explore animations, transitions, and media queries for dynamic web design.

modules.title: Module 1: CSS Animations
modules.description: Create animations with CSS.

modules.title: Module 2: Transitions
modules.description: Add smooth transitions.

modules.title: Module 3: Media Queries
modules.description: Make designs responsive.

modules.title: Module 4: Advanced Techniques
modules.description: Advanced CSS techniques.

css4.title: Cascading Style Sheets For Beginners
css4.subtitle: 4. CSS Frameworks
css4.description: Introduction to popular frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to Frameworks
modules.description: What are CSS frameworks?

modules.title: Module 2: Bootstrap
modules.description: Learn Bootstrap framework.

modules.title: Module 3: Tailwind CSS
modules.description: Explore Tailwind CSS.

modules.title: Module 4: Custom Frameworks
modules.description: Build your own framework.

java3.title: JavaScript For Beginners
java3.subtitle: 3. Asynchronous JavaScript
java3.description: Understand promises, async/await and AJAX for dynamic content.

modules.title: Module 1: Callbacks
modules.description: Understanding callbacks in JS.

modules.title: Module 2: Promises
modules.description: Working with promises.

modules.title: Module 3: Async/Await
modules.description: Using async/await syntax.

modules.title: Module 4: AJAX
modules.description: Fetching data with AJAX.

java4.title: JavaScript For Beginners
java4.subtitle: 4. Frameworks and Libraries
java4.description: Introduction to React, Vue and other popular JS frameworks.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to Frameworks
modules.description: What are JS frameworks?

modules.title: Module 2: React
modules.description: Learn React framework.

modules.title: Module 3: Vue.js
modules.description: Explore Vue.js.

modules.title: Module 4: Other Libraries
modules.description: jQuery and other libraries.

php3.title: PHP For Beginners
php3.subtitle: 3. Web Security
php3.description: Understand common vulnerabilities and how to secure PHP applications.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to Web Security
modules.description: Basics of web security.

modules.title: Module 2: HTTPS, SSL/TLS
modules.description: Secure connections.

modules.title: Module 3: Common Vulnerabilities
modules.description: SQL injection, XSS, etc.

modules.title: Module 4: Secure Coding Practices
modules.description: Best practices for security.

php4.title: PHP For Beginners
php4.subtitle: 4. Frameworks
php4.description: Introduction to Laravel and other PHP frameworks for rapid development.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to Frameworks
modules.description: What are PHP frameworks?

modules.title: Module 2: Laravel Basics
modules.description: Learn Laravel framework.

modules.title: Module 3: Other Frameworks
modules.description: Symfony, CodeIgniter, etc.

modules.title: Module 4: Building Applications
modules.description: Build apps with frameworks.
